message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $150, so I can offer it to you for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to come down a bit more?
I'm not comfortable going below $135, but I can try to meet you halfway between $135 and $125. I can offer it to you for $130. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $128?
I'm trying to find a sweet spot for both of us. I can offer it to you for $132, which is a bit above your last offer. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd like to get a bit closer to my target. Would you be willing to meet me at $129?
I'm not willing to go below $132, but I can try to meet you halfway between $132 and $129. I can offer it to you for $130.50. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, but I really need to stick to my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
